info.task: read information about expanded accordion header
info.title: Read information about an expanded accordion header in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
testPageDocument.getElementById('accordion1id').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
